statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Organic Free Trade coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${9.50} per pound with some Ethiopian coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${13.00} per pound to create \displaystyle{10} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${9.85} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
pounds of Organic Free Trade coffee.
